features: Enjoy a Cleaner Home or Business Faster than Ever!- Our Mop System is perfect for cleaning all types of floors, including laminate, hardwood, tile, vinyl, stone & concrete. Our Microfiber Mop Heads are durable and machine washable providing major $ savings!
Easier to use than the Competition- Our Spin Mop makes rinsing the mop head easier than any other mop on the market. You don’t have to spend as much energy to get the mop head to spin.
Never buy another Floor Cleaning System Again! - This Cleaning Kit includes 3 Microfiber Mop Heads that are reusable and washable along with an extendable pole!
Compatible with the 79161- 6 Pack Spin Mop Head Refills. You can order those at your convenience on Amazon. Just Search for 79161 Spin Mop Head Refills!
body.description: With the Simpli-Magic Spin Mop & Bucket System, you will enjoy an effective and efficient cleaning experience. This Spin Mop System is ideal for all Hard Floors with no bending down or wet hand necessary. This Super Value Kit allows you to control the amount of water applied to the follow, easy wringing and quick drying. 3 Microfiber Mop Heads are Included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great buy!
reviews.reviewText: This mop was very easy to use and it does the trick. I have hardwood and tile floors and two small dogs who track a lot of stuff into the house. I like that it came with three mop heads so I can use them in different rooms (kitchen, foyer and baths) and then toss them into the washer and air dry them. The spin mechanism works well and spins most of the moisture out of the mop after using. The mop heads wash up well and are easily reusable. The mop also works well in the tub and tile of the shower and at the base of toilet to clean those areas without stretching or bending down. I also used it to wipe down the baseboards which tend to collect dust and fur in my house. This just whisks it away and leaves everything clean and almost sry. Highly recommend. I actually bought more mop heads on Amazon to use so I’ve always got clean spares in case I need them! Highly recommend this item for anyone!

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Manufacturer Defect in the bucket mechanism to spin, doesn't return up
reviews.reviewText: Manufacturer Defect in the bucket mechanism to spin, doesn't return up after used couple times, they send a replacement but it has the same issue works at the begging but later fails with the use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fragile and not sturdy
reviews.reviewText: The mop head locks so you have to grab it and adjust for every new angle. It also doing so if you mopping let’s say a wall, it will spin instead of mop leaving zero scrub. The head also doesn’t fit easily in the bucket spot made for it so when you rinse and place in it, it spills water all over. The head is also fragile and tears easily. Will be switching to the o-cedar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mop, multiple uses!
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I used the white head to clean my moldings and the blue one to mop. I have a lot of moldings, I usually wipe them down with a wet cloth. This was a lot easier on my back! I also used the dry one to dust all of my shutters and it worked great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy way to mop
reviews.reviewText: I like how easy it is to use. The mop heads get edges and corners where my previous mop system did not get the corners. I can use my preferred cleaning product. Very happy with this product

reviews.reviewTitle: This is very cheap unfortunately. The mops are not washable either.
reviews.reviewText: When I sweep the cheap plastic top of the mop scrapes my floor. When I washed the mop head, it came out as a hard stuck together mess - it no longer looks or acts like a mop.
